title: Anniversary Gifts sent seperately???
body:
So on my main I got the anniversary icon but not the skin is this intended or do I have to put in a ticket??

Help rito

replies.body: The gifts are in fact being sent separately, and we're not done rolling them ut.  Stay up to date on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) and hang tight.  Hopefully, not too much longer until this is all wrapped up!
Yes, this is normal. The gifts are sent out separately, not at the same time.
